name: Comedy of Horrors.
description:
Welcome Mr. Muniandi to your yearly revival. 

Every year during your death anniversary, you get to roam around in this world as a ghost for 3 days. This year seems like it will be a little more interesting though.

Comedy of Horrors is a 2D interactive fiction/puzzle  game where you try to haunt different elements in the Environment to help out the main character with something that is very much relatable - D e b t s. Well, rich roots always come in handy ;)

If your end goal in (after)life was always to be a snarky, narcissistic and arrogant ghost with a soft spot for your broke descendants, here is exactly what you ordered.
